title: Ending of Triggerman (Person of Interest)(2 x 4)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: 1:45 It’s at that moment he knew he took the wrong job.
description:
Things are concluded in the fourth episode of season 2 which shows Roots influence on Harold as well as what Elias asked for in return for helping John and Harold.
